name: Kyuri-Chan
description:
Kyuri-Chan is the largest cucumber on the land, but all of the other vegetables are trying to kill her so that they can get a chance to be eaten.

Defend yourselves from the different types of enemies, and make your way through to the kitchen to be turned into a delicious cucumber.

This game was made for the "Tu Juego A Juicio Jam" between the 18th of August to the 1st of September of 2021, with the theme of the jam being "Too long".
